column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////If you love and I mean LOVE Chicago style deep dish
column2: pass over Lou Malnati's.  Compared to some of the other fantastic pizzaria's Chicago has to boast
column3: this one is not up to Chicago standards in my opinion.  I had no complaints about the crust
column4: but the rest of the pizza
column5: toppings and flavor made me feel like I was dining at Pizza Hut.  There was nothing overly special about it and it had a fast food feel to it.
